alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 12:26AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Noxubee and northern Kemper Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1226 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bevill Lock And Dam to Gholson. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Preston, Macon, Prairie Point, Deerbrook, Bigbee Valley, Gholson, Cooksville, Paulette and Shuqualak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for northeastern and east central Mississippi.
